嶕嶕嶕

嶕字的基本解释

嶕
jiāo
古同“礁”。
山名。
〔嶕嶢〕高峻，如“泰山之高不嶕嶕，则不能??滃云而歊烝散。”
山巅。

嶕字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiāo］
［《廣韻》昨焦切，平宵，從。］
［《集韻》兹消切，平宵，精。］
亦作“嶣1”。
(1)高。
(2)同“礁”。礁石。

嶕字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【山字部】　嶕； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页319第35
【廣韻】昨焦切【集韻】慈消切，?音樵。嶕嶢，山高貌。【班固·東都賦】別風嶕嶢。【註】別風，闕名。嶕嶢，高也。【左思·吳都賦】陵絕嶛嶕。　又【集韻】茲消切，音焦。山名。　又【廣韻】山巔曰嶕，亦借用椒。【謝莊·月賦】菊散芳於山椒。【註】山頂也。

嶕字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
嶕字的起名意思

暂无。

嶕
Basic explanation of words
嶕
jiāo
The ancient same "reef".
Mountain name.
〔嶕峣〕It is high and steep, such as "The height of Mount Tai is not too high, so you can't get rid of the clouds."
Mountain top.
嶕
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jiāo］
["Guang Yun" Jiao cut yesterday, flat night, from. ]
["Ji Yun" is hereby cut, flat night, fine. ]
Also known as "嶣1".
(1) High.
(2) Same as "reef". reef.
嶕
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Collection] [Mountain Character Department] 　嶕; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 319 35
[Guang Yun] Jiao cut yesterday [Ji Yun] Compassionately cut,? Yinqiao. The hills are tall and beautiful. 【Banggu·Dongdu Fu】Don't be windy. [Note] Don’t be windy, just name it. Jiao, high. [Zuo Si·Wu Du Fu] Ling Jue嶛嶕.　 [Ji Yun] Now cut and cut, the sound is focused. Mountain name.　[Guangyun] The top of the mountain is called Jiao, and it also borrows pepper. 【Xie Zhuang·Yue Fu】The chrysanthemum is scattered and fragrant in Sanjiao. [Note] The top of the mountain is also.
嶕
